detailsData.title: Extensive Experience
detailsData.content: Over 175 years of combined experience handling tax disputes with federal and state taxing agencies.

detailsData.title: Government Experience
detailsData.content: Over 40 years of government experience with the California Department of Tax and Fee Administration, I.R.S., and U.S. Justice Department.

detailsData.title: Unique Perspective
detailsData.content: A blend of government and private practice experience to resolve tax controversies in and out of court.

valueProp: Taylor Nelson Amitrano LLP is a leading tax law firm with a team of experienced professionals dedicated to resolving tax disputes effectively.
topics: Federal & State Tax Audits, Collections & Appeals
